name: NetCDF-4 (Network Common Data Form, version 4)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">nc</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: A platform-independent file format for storing scientific data, supporting annotated multidimensional arrays, hierarchical groups of data objects, user-defined data types, and features for enhanced performance, including support for parallel I/O, data compression, and chunked storage.
